croll of protection from earth was a magical scroll found in Zakhara, the Land of Fate.
Reading this scroll created an area of protection centered around the caster, with a diameter of . It protected the caster from all earth-based attacks, as well as natural effects. It offered protection against avalanches, earthquakes, quicksand, sand slides, etc. It also allowed those within the area of protection to walk safely across unstable ground. While the scroll did not protect against physical attacks from dao or earth elementals, it did protect against their earth-based effects.
